entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
